name: Moero! Nekketsu Rhythm Damashii: Osu! Tatakae! Ouendan 2
name_original: Moero! Nekketsu Rhythm Damashii: Osu! Tatakae! Ouendan 2
description:
Moero! Nekketsu Rhythm Damashii: Osu! Tatakae! Ouendan 2 is an action game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Moero! Nekketsu Rhythm Damashii: Osu! Tatakae! Ouendan 2 is available on Nintendo DS.
